name: 3. CONTENT FORMATTER: Trigger "Yes" Send Test Email -> Format Content using ChatGPT -> Create Brevo Email Campaign

designer.name: Triggers when "Yes" on Finalize Test Email

interface.label: Finalize and Push a Test Email? (C)
Send Final Newsletter to Brevo List (E)

messages.content:
You're task is to convert the newsletter input data coming from Google Document text into an HTML format. Create different table for every "SUBSECTIONS" together with their {IMAGE SOURCE}, {CITATION LINK} and {SUBSECTION CONTENT}. The Subsections content are separated by -----. Create one table for "SOCIAL MEDIA CONTENTS" section together with their {TITLE}, {CITATION LINK} and {SOCIALMEDIA OVERVIEW}. Create one table for "AI TOOLS AND UPDATES" section together with their {TITLE}, {CITATION LINK} and {AITOOLS OVERVIEW}. Add color blue italic formatting on 1 important phrase for each sections EXCEPT for the "PROMPT OF DAY SECTION" and "AI TOOLS SECTION". Add this on all sections including conclusion and serrala insights. I will provide the HTML format below. =============== Input Data: {{4.text}} =============== Final Output in HTML:

Welcome back! {PUT ONE PARAGRAPH INTRO HERE}

Today's Insights

{PUT THE BULLET FORM LIST HERE AS HTML}

AI FINANCE NEWS

put the {CITATION LINK} here

{SUBSECTION NEWS SOURCE}: {SUBSECTION TITLE}

put the {SUBSECTION CONTENT} paragraph here

SOCIAL SIGNALS

Trending on Socials This Week

📈 put the {SOCIAL MEDIA TITLE} here: put the {SOCIAL MEDIA OVERVIEW} here
📊 put the {SOCIAL MEDIA TITLE} here: put the {SOCIAL MEDIA OVERVIEW} here

PRODUCTIVITY

AI Tools and Updates

✅ put the {AI TOOLS TITLE} here: put the {AI TOOLS OVERVIEW} here
✅ put the {AI TOOLS TITLE} here: put the {AI TOOLS OVERVIEW} here

PROMPT OF THE DAY

put the {PROMPT TITLE} here

put the {PROMPT CONTENT} here

SERRALA DAILY INSIGHTS


put random business emoji here; put the {BLOG TITLE} here: put the {SUMMARY OF BLOG} here
put random business emoji here; put the {BLOG TITLE} here: put the {SUMMARY OF BLOG} here

SERRALA UPCOMING EVENTS


put random business emoji here; put the {EVENT TITLE} here: put the {OVERVIEW OF EVENT} here
put random business emoji here; put the {EVENT TITLE} here: put the {OVERVIEW OF EVENT} here

Conclusion

{PUT THE CONCLUSION CONTENT PARAGRAPH HERE AS HTML}
=============== Rules: -just output the html code with content and nothing else -dont put ```html or any additional outputs -the content of the newsletter should be the same
